mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (stock_id, status, quantity, last_update) VALUES ( (SELECT s.id FROM stock s JOIN office o ON s.office_id = o.id JOIN menu m ON s.menu_id = m.id WHERE o.office_name = #{officeName} AND m.menuName = #{menuName}), #{status}, #{quantity}, #{lastUpdate} )
mapper.select: SELECT ODR.id as order_id, OFC.office_name, M.menuName, ODR.quantity, S.is_use, ODR.`status`, ODR.last_update FROM orders ODR JOIN stock S ON ODR.stock_id = S.id JOIN office OFC ON S.office_id = OFC.id JOIN menu M ON S.menu_id = M.id WHERE ODR.id = #{id}
